name: Mv
body: ### Installation ### Download the plugin and place it in the folder called your_project_directory/js/plugins. And then In Plugin Manager, Select RS_*.js plugin and add it. ![HowtoDownloadPlugin](http://i.imgur.com/BCG99Dm.png) ### To send feedback ### If you have feedback to send me, please write your feedback at the following site. - [My Blog](http://biud436.tistory.com/notice/21) - [Issues](https://github.com/biud436/MV/issues) ### Credit and Thanks ### Biud436 ### Terms of Use ### Free for commercial and non-commercial use. ### License ### The MIT License (MIT)
